UnifiedTaskParticipant.name: UnifiedTaskParticipant
UnifiedTaskParticipant.description: Represents a participant in a task.

ActivityId.description: ID of the activity the person is participating in.

ChannelAddress.description: Username of the participant. The username is captured at the time of the communication; it doesn’t change if the contact’s username is updated later.

ParticipantType.description: The participant’s role in the activity.

PersonId.description: ID of the contact, lead, or user participating in the activity.
